content: it s not fancy or complicated but it s a darn good hat the smooth stitch pattern and classic shape is great for guys or gals this pattern makes great use of just one skein of a beautiful hand dyed yarn from your mom knits 1 this hat measures about 21 22 23 in circumference through body of hat 18 19 19 75 in circumference at ribbing which will stretch at least 3 and 9 25 9 5 9 75 tall sample was made in size m 22 around body of hat and is modeled on a head that measures 22 in circumference 1 http //www etsy com/shop/yourmomknits section_id=13132396
